ygData.subject: Re: Smithing
ygData.msgSnippet: Someone might know where it is closer to Qeynos.. The closest i have found is Freeport, next the dawrven home of butcherblock, finally in the gnomish town of
ygData.messageBody:
Someone might know where it is closer to Qeynos.. The closest i have found
is Freeport, next the dawrven home of butcherblock, finally in the gnomish
town of Ak'Anon. If someone knows of a closer place please reply..

Lance

-----Original Message-----
From: MCollins [mailto:sandman1@...]
Sent: Friday, April 30, 1999 6:55 AM
To: EverQuest@onelist.com
Subject: [EverQuest] Smithing


From: MCollins <sandman1@...>

I am a beginning smith based in Qeynos and i am having a great deal of
trouble finding ore near that city. I was told that the closest place
to find ore was in the Dwarven area, but I find it hard to believe that
I would have to go that far! Does anyone know of a place I can get ore
within 2or 3 zones of Qeynos?

Marc
